name: Xane's Messenger Theme
description: This is a customizable Facebook Messenger theme designed for dark themes. It keeps a flat look and works both on Facebook and the standalone Messenger website. See the "advanced options" for customization.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

obsoletion_message: As Messenger has updated its appearance somewhat (and Facebook got a new website design), this userstyle doesn't look right anymore. If I feel the urge to restyle Messenger again, this will be completely remade.
additional_info: Removed dark color from the "will be able to call you and see your active status" message.

style_setting_options.label: Your message BG
Other message BG
Extra color #1
Extra color #2
Image (Fill)
style_setting_options.value: ._4sp8, body { background-image: url('/*[[bgimage]]*/'); background-size: cover; background-position: center !important; }

style_setting_options.label: Image (Small Tile)
style_setting_options.value: ._4sp8, body { background-image: url('/*[[bgimage]]*/'); background-size: 12.5%; background-position: center !important; }

style_setting_options.label: Image (Medium Tile)
style_setting_options.value: ._4sp8, body { background-image: url('/*[[bgimage]]*/'); background-size: 25%; background-position: center !important; }

style_setting_options.label: Image (Large Tile)
style_setting_options.value: ._4sp8, body { background-image: url('/*[[bgimage]]*/'); background-size: 50%; background-position: center !important; }

style_setting_options.label: No
style_setting_options.value: /* FB bar is visible when on Facebook. */
